author: chaserxy
content: is it just me, or are there really no Shanghai or Acapella meta-EIPs and Magicians metathreads?

author: timbeiko
content: There will be a blog post, yes! ETA tomorrow or Wednesday

author: timbeiko
content: We stopped doing "Meta EIPs" (although I think we should probably bring them back...!), but you can see the spec changes here:

author: chaserxy
content:
thanks Tim! that EL spec looks like a meta EIP. the CL spec less so (maybe I'm out of the loop and not aware that CL development doesn't use the EIP process). the reason I brought these up is two-fold:
* meta EIPs allow people who are less technical and less in the weeds to see how Ethereum will change under them with an upgrade (IMHO very important),
* Magicians metathreads allow easier organization and input from a  wider audience (as you excellently pointed out here: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/proposal-network-upgrade-meta-threads/12552, although the idea isn't new, I'm sure we had such a thread at least for Istanbul and Berlin)
